HomePage.title: LEXLEAKS
HomePage.subtitle: Exposing the Fine Print.
HomePage.noStoriesDescription: Be the first to expose misconduct in the legal industry. Your courage to speak up can make a difference.

PostPage.exposeDescription: Have evidence of legal industry misconduct? Your story could protect others and bring accountability to those who abuse their power.

SubmitPage.title: Submit Your Leak
SubmitPage.description: LexLeaks is dedicated to exposing corruption, misconduct, and unethical practices in the legal industry. We take the security of our sources extremely seriously and have implemented multiple layers of protection.
SubmitPage.warningText: Do not submit false information. We thoroughly verify all claims and will pursue legal action against those who attempt to use our platform for defamation or false accusations.
SubmitPage.helpDescription: If you have questions about the submission process or need technical assistance, our security team is here to help. Remember: your safety is our priority.

Footer.dedication: Dedicated to transparency and accountability in the legal industry.
